name: Coma (nickonmir)
description:
A short class class project. You play as a girl in a coma in a pixel art style roguelike where the goal is to kill the faceless husks of yourself trying to make you go brain dead.

Music by: Paul Mekailian

Controls:

ESC for menu (quit/restart)

Arrow keys to move.

Z to dash and stab. The blue/purple indicator above the player dictates whether 
the cooldown for the dash has finished.

Hold X to charge up your dash (will now go twice as far and do double damage). Once X is charged up, you can use the charged dash by pressing Z.
